defs: = ಪರಿವರ್ತನೆಗೊಳ್ಳು.

a change, as in form, nature, qualities, etc.; mutation.

(biol.) a sudden variation in some inheritable characteristic in a germ cell of an individual animal or plant, as distinguished from a variation resulting from generations of gradual change; mutation.

to cause to become different.
